mapper.insert:
insert into tbl_tran( id, owner, money, name, expectedDate, customerId, stage, type, source, activityId, contactsId, createBy, createTime, editBy, editTime, description, contactSummary, nextContactTime ) values ( #{id}, #{owner}, #{money}, #{name}, #{expectedDate}, #{customerId}, #{stage}, #{type}, #{source}, #{activityId}, #{contactsId}, #{createBy}, #{createTime}, #{editBy}, #{editTime}, #{description}, #{contactSummary}, #{nextContactTime}
);
mapper.select:
select count(*) from tbl_tran t join tbl_customer cu on t.customerId = cu.id join tbl_contacts con on t.contactsId = con.id join tbl_user u on t.owner = u.id
u.name like '%' #{owner} '%'
and t.name like '%' #{name} '%'
and t.stage like '%' #{stage} '%'
and t.type like '%' #{type} '%'
and t.source like '%' #{source} '%'
and t.customerId=#{customerId}
and t.contactsId=#{contactsId}

select tran.id, user.name as owner, tran.money, tran.name, tran.expectedDate, cus.name as customerId, tran.stage, tran.type, tran.source, act.name as activityId, con.fullname as contactsId, tran.createBy, tran.createTime, tran.editBy, tran.editTime, tran.description, tran.contactSummary, tran.nextContactTime from tbl_tran tran inner join tbl_user user on tran.owner=user.id inner join tbl_customer cus on tran.customerId=cus.id left outer join tbl_activity act on tran.activityId=act.id left outer join tbl_contacts con on tran.contactsId=con.id
where tran.id=#{id}
mapper.update: update tbl_tran set stage=#{stage}, editBy=#{editBy},editTime=#{editTime} where id=#{id};
